title: On the quantum reflection factor for the sinh-Gordon model with general boundary conditions
abstract: The one loop quantum corrections to the classical reflection factor of the sinh-Gordon model are calculated partially for general boundary conditions. The model is studied under boundary conditions which are compatible with integrability, and in the framework of the conventional perturbation theory generalized to the affine Toda field theory. It is found that the general form of the related quantum corrections are hypergeometric functions.
